A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: OMG!  What a dumpster fire of a movie!  Ridiculous plot. Vapid dialogue.  Misplaced humor. Poor character development. No resolution to origin of Snoke and origin of Rey. Creates new Jedi powers. Worst of all\, the movie marginalizes one of the greatest characters in cinematic history - Luke Skywalker.  Felt like a a Micheal Bay movie.  The top critics should be ashamed of themselves for their reviews.
